Uhm I've never seen that error or cant find anything about it there is a "Game version incorrect" error if you try to join a game of a different version, tbh online play is not that great. You can connect to someone hosting if you know their ip, I wouldnt mind doing an online game, the quickest ways to get ahold of me are facebook, and irc.
